name: Yellowstone National Park
description: First national park in the U.S., known for geysers and wildlife.

challenge.title: Spot a geyser eruption
challenge.description: Try to watch Old Faithful or another geyser erupt and note its interval.

motivation: Keep your eyes open — nature has surprises!

name: Yosemite National Park
description: Famous for granite cliffs, waterfalls, and giant sequoias.

challenge.title: Hike to a waterfall
challenge.description: Find and hike to one of Yosemite's waterfalls and take a photo from the viewpoint.

motivation: Take your time — the views reward the climb.

name: Grand Canyon National Park
description: Known for its immense canyon carved by the Colorado River.

challenge.title: Watch sunrise over the canyon
challenge.description: Get up early and see the canyon at sunrise from a viewpoint.

motivation: Early mornings bring the best light — cherish the quiet.

name: Zion National Park
description: Deep red canyons and high plateaus for hiking and canyoneering.

challenge.title: Explore a slot canyon
challenge.description: Walk a short slot canyon or narrow section and observe the rock striations.

motivation: Be curious and careful — every canyon has a story.

name: Acadia National Park
description: Coastal park with rocky beaches, forests, and scenic carriage roads.

challenge.title: Tidepool exploration
challenge.description: Visit a rocky shoreline at low tide and spot sea life in tidepools.

motivation: Slow down and look closely — tiny worlds await.

name: Everglades National Park
description: A vast network of wetlands and slow-moving waters, home to unique wildlife.

challenge.title: Birdwatching at dawn
challenge.description: Find a quiet spot to observe wading birds and note at least three species.

motivation: Patience pays off — listen for wings and calls.

name: Rocky Mountain National Park
description: Alpine peaks, hiking trails, and abundant wildlife.

challenge.title: Summit a viewpoint
challenge.description: Hike to a high viewpoint and take in the alpine scenery.

motivation: Breathe deep — you're standing where the sky feels close.
